channel.title: CVE Feed for GTKWave -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GTKWave -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-34087|2024-08-02T16:01:53.892Z -- gtkwave -- gtkwave
item.description: An improper array index validation vulnerability exists in the EVCD var len parsing functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A specially crafted .evcd file can lead to arbitrary code execution. A victim would need to open a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-32650|2024-08-02T15:25:36.348Z -- gtkwave -- gtkwave
item.description: An integer overflow vulnerability exists in the FST_BL_GEOM parsing maxhandle functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115, when compiled as a 32-bit binary. A specially crafted .fst file can lead to memory corruption. A victim would need to open a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.
